title: Amazing fun workplace
description: Working at Gap clothing store offers a dynamic retail experience focused on customer service, teamwork, and fashion. Employees typically handle tasks like greeting customers, restocking merchandise, processing transactions, and maintaining visual standards.

title: Great place to work.
description: Fun, exciting environment with great peers and cross divisional partnerships. It's a one for all and all for one. Everyone supports one another and pushes one another to grow. Many confusing decisions ultimately cost the company, as the mindset of being

title: Very satisfied
description: Great team environment. Motivational and positive. I met a lot of great people and management was always uplifting and helpful trying to help us reach our targets.

title: As expected
description: Work was as you would imagine hours restocking items and refolding items. Assisting customers that come in all forms, some rude and some nice. Some days were better than others

title: Great Management
description: Great place to work when you have a good team and management who set a great workplace culture. I have worked with other managers at Gap that make the job stressful but my current one is amazing

title: A fairly ok temp or in-between job
description: If you are confident in your ability to hustle credit cards that most people don't want then go for this job while between opportunities. If you doubt your ability to get 5 new cardholders a week then don't bother. They'll play it off week one but by

title: depends on management
description: Got lucky with good management so my time at Gap was good. Demographic is what you think - middle aged moms and grandmas looking for clothes for themselves and kids. Guys looking for work clothes. The discount is pretty good but clothes are pretty expensive

title: Pays mid but overall lightweight job
description: In one year I hadn't gotten a pay raise despite picking up more jobs around the workplace, the jobs are easy for most people but cashiering requires a training

title: Simple and clear expectations.
description: Fine job, great entry level retail job. Pay varies based on location and manager. Expect to state desired pay during interviews. They will try to undersell you. Can be rough being on your feet for long periods but overall fine.

title: Amazing
description: Gap is an amazing place to work! Supportive team, great leadership, and a fast-paced environment that keeps you engaged. Growth opportunities abound!!

title: What you would  expect from a reatail env
description: I worked there for a couple of months because they won't work around your schedule. It's everything you would expect; I was lucky enough to get good supervisors, co-workers are a hit or miss, and mine were terrible.

title: Was cool while it lasted,  very flexible and accomodating for uni students.
description: This company helped me gain lots of knowledge of everything there is to know about retail over my tenure. I reccomend this for a job that will give you that experience needed to get better jobs down the road.

title: Easy work but slow sometimes
description: The work is pretty easy and the management for the most part is nice. During peak it’s nice hours and nice pay. After peak it goes down hill on hours.

title: Fun
description: Fun to work more like a family

title: Great experience
description: Loved working here great benefits, management and job the make sure you’re full trained and are always there to help ! Great health benefits and perks

title: good first experience
description: Started working here a few years ago and it is a good first job experience to learn the basics of working. I was a sales associate and worked the cash register. only downside was expectations to ope. up credit cards.

title: Normal retail job
description: Pay is minimum wage,  but aside from that, it's your average retail job.  Management was great.

title: Easy Work
description: Depending what position you have a workday can be easy as playing uno. Picking is usually where you start, once you advance there you get incentives and options to be crossed trained faster. They faster you learn the more incentives you can make. You

title: Straightforward
description: The work is pretty straightforward, ring people up, restock the floor with clothes, organize the store. Although it can pile up and costumers can be annoying. I assume it’s the same at any other retail though.  Some managers are strict while others are very chill.

title: Productive fun
description: Friendly environment staff kids were fun to work with customers were a joy management was pretty good love having the sales and working with new product
